means: [地名] [美国] 波因特布朗克

sentence.Network_en: Buildings crashed in flames as the Russians fired their artillery at pointblank range.
sentence.Network_cn: 俄军大炮近距离开火炮轰,房屋一一倒塌,化为烈焰.

PerfectNetExp.abs: pointbar 点坝, pointblank 直截了当, pointbardeposit 边滩沉积

list.abs: 什么意思... ... flak curse roundly 辱骂性的批评 baldly pointblank roundly 露骨地 rounding 圆的；使圆的；凑整的.

entry.def: If you say something point-blank, you say it very directly or rudely, without explaining or apologizing.

example.ex: The army apparently refused point blank to do what was required of them...
example.tran: 军队貌似断然拒绝做他们分内的事情。

example.ex: Mr Patterson was asked point blank if he would resign.
example.tran: 帕特森先生被直接问到他是否会辞职。

entry.def: If someone or something is shot point-blank, they are shot when the gun is touching them or extremely close to them.

example.tran: 他近距离朝贝尔纳黛特开了枪。
